document_data.caption: A map showing Graygruun in Norheim.
document_data.name: Graygruun
document_data.mainbody: '''Graygruun''' was an island within the kingdom of [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Graygruun was found toward the center of Norheim just east of the large island of [[Giantspine]]. It sat at the end of [[Northwind Strait]] where the [[Sea of Moonshae]] met the [[Trackless Sea]]. Graygruun was only {{SI|20|mi|k|long=yes}} long and about {{SI|5|mi|k|long=yes}} wide.
